name: Medma Infomatix Private Limited
description:
Medma Infomatix is a Leading Website Development, iPhone app development, Android app development and eCommerce Development Company, headquartered in Lucknow, India. We offer customized solutions for eCommerce, Magento, Ruby on Rails, CakePHP, Mobile Application, Website Design and SEO services.
We have a team of expert professionals having deep knowledge in the spectrum of their expertise as well as possessing strong communication skills. By these capabilities our experts provide effective and on time solutions to our clients.
For more info www.medma.net
You can send us your queries at sales@medma.net
